File Name

File name should not be longer than 31 characters, otherwise style linking does not work in MS Word/Mac.

file name length is '26': 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

-/-

File Name

Advance width

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Advance

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Error

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 603

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
260 = 260

Info

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

no subsetting flag: False

table version 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

no subsetting flag: False

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali UI Bold (NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

name

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

name

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 6

'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-Light'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali Light Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '20'
'Noto Sans Bengali UI'

Pass

name

MS NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

name

NID 4 'Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular' ≠ NID 1 'Noto Sans Bengali UI'

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '25'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali UI Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

'Noto is a trademark of Google Inc.'
but what do think about this
'Noto is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

name

name

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali Med Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '26'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali SemBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-SemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Bold (NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali UI Bold (NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

but what do think about this

Noto Sans Bengali UI Bold (NotoSansBengaliUI-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '27'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: '2.000;GOOG;NotoSansBengaliUI-ExtraBold'

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2017 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'NotoSansBengaliUI-Black'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansBengaliUI-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Bengali UI Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Bengali Blk' (NID 1).

Pass

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.'

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Blk Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

PostScript names

PostScript names

Warning

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Is longer:
'iivowelsigncandrabindurephbeng
iivowelsigncandrabindualtbeng
iivowelcandrabindurephaltbeng
iivowelsigncandrabindushortbeng
iivowelcandrabindurephshortbeng'

Pass

Noto Sans Bengali Thin Regular (NotoSansBengaliUI-Thin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

post

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.
